snippet: The race for a key Los Angeles County post involves two very different celebrities: Bobby Shriver, a member of the Kennedy clan, and Sheila Kuehl, a former actress now steeped in policy and politics.
abstract: Race for key Los Angeles County board post involves two Democrats who are very different celebrities: Bobby Shriver, nephew to John F Kennedy, and Sheila Kuehl, former actress now steeped in policy and politics; eight-person race has offered glimpse into two slices of Los Angeles society, study of contrasts in social class, political sensibility, style and wealth.
lead_paragraph: The race for a key Los Angeles County post involves two very different celebrities: Bobby Shriver, a member of the Kennedy clan, and Sheila Kuehl, a former actress now steeped in policy and politics.

headline.main: In California Race, Pedigree vs. Policy (and Bit of TV Nostalgia)
headline.print_headline: In California Race, Pedigree vs. Policy (and Bit of TV Nostalgia)
